opened.The body will be strengthened or that the feeling of hunger will be eliminated, none of these two will now have many faces.There are many faces of the people or the imams.There are people who are in the name of Nazi and their faces.It will be pleased with her that it was their effort, but today Allah accepted that the people would be thankful that the people of the day would be popular.No matter what this question will not even listen to it.By applying it with the verses of the Qur'an, there is a little bit of precision everywhere, so there is also a place where the Qur'anic verses of the Qur'an are in the Qur'an.Allam Iqbal has said that look at the offset and then conclude that the culture that is created by the Qur'an is created.Then the ruling leaders who have no credentials are in the minor and neither is in duplicate.وَلْبَسَرَ وَالْفُوَاتُ قُلَّ عُلَيْتَ قَعْنَانُ وَالْفُسُولَةُ ۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔۔ How is their body harmony with their environment with their environment not getting water but they have been walking They are not getting food, make their feet so that there are no panic inside the sand.How are these springs and how it is a spring, it is the geology of the geology.He should research it.اِنَّ فِي خَلْقِ سَمَاوَاتِ وَاللَّرْضِ وَاخْتِلَىٰ فِي اللَّهِ وَالنَّهَارِ وَالْفُلْكِ لَتِى تَجْلِفِ الْمَحْرِ مِنْ مَا يَنْفَعُ الْنَاسِ وَمَنْ وَلسَّحَابِ الْمُسَخْرِ بَنَ السَّمَااِ لَا يَاتِلَّ قَوْمِ يَاقِلُونَ Harsha came, Sheikh Sadi says: The arc is an arc in it every address looks like a burden of Allah Almighty and today we know that before today, people did not know that there is a factory in each address.There is a factory of photoshouses that is solar energy that is disturbing it and what is going on in the woods.That is the same solar energy that is the same and this solar is fighting the heat of the sun and that is going there.Every address is a factory.What happened is a special pass scenario.You know that the people who were previously addressed were living their lives in the Qur'an.The camels are riding on the top, the sky is the grains, the mountains are the mountains.The four things are the ones that you are, but you are watching with the hugs.You have also seen the camels that there are skies above and there is a mountain here.You have seen what you have seen.Never heard and there is also a flame inside your dust.There is also a rally of the Lord of the Holy Spirit.He has ever seen it.Those who are the nature of the tribalin, they will be inspired.All these things have been smiled for you.Moscry them.That is, they will stop their path.It is not your job in the way of hadeeth, except for the one who turned away and disbelieved, and disbelieved, Fayyu -e -Azzabah -ul -Allahu al -Azab -ul -Kukfar will punish him with great punishment.There is no stain about his personality about his character, giving any doubts to the right to come out of it.There is no stain about his personality.Have to come to Sima Anna -ul -Alaiynah Hasabahmah, then take our responsibilities.You should do your job.It is your duty to pay the rest.Leave it to us and leave me.Let me know to them.Allah Almighty Allah Almighty Allah Amen or the Lord of the Worlds Barak Allah and the Lord of the Worlds, but
